metadata.title: I Can't Let You Go

xml.lyrics:
What did I do wrong, baby
I tried to keep you satisfied
Whenever you needed me
I was right there by your side
Now tell me
What's the reason, baby
What's the reason
You're leaving me
I ain't got nobody else
Baby, it's always been you
'Cause there ain't nobody
Ain't nobody else
Can make me feel the way you do
I love you, I love you
I love you so, baby
You know I just can't
I just can't let you go
(Trying out this banner exchange service)
